question: This bank has ties up with Celebrus Capital for online trading services, recently.
explanation: Catholic Syrian Bank Ltd (CSB) has partnered with Celebrus Capital Ltd (Celebrus), to offer online equity trading and demat services to its customers. As per the terms of the tie-up, CSB's customers will be able to open a Celebrus trading account free of cost. Besides, customers opening trading accounts will enjoy preferred rates on brokerage charges and Annual Maintenance Charges (AMC) on the demat account. The customers will be able to execute their trades through Celebrus' mobile trading and investment platform - LEAP, which has been created in association with Thomson Reuters.
